patthana22.36:1.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.36:2.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana22.36:3.1_0: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana22.36:4.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇañca naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana22.36:5.1_0: Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
patthana22.36:7.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo dhammo sanidassanasappaṭighassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … satta.
patthana22.36:8.1_0: Naanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo dhammo sanidassanasappaṭighassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … satta.
patthana22.36:9.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo ca dhammā sanidassanasappaṭighassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … satta.
patthana22.36:10.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo dhammo anidassanaappaṭighassa araṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana22.36:10.1_1: Naanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo dhammo anidassanaappaṭighassa araṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana22.36:10.1_2: Nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo ca dhammā anidassanaappaṭighassa araṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana22.36:11.1_6: pacchājāte kamme āhāre indriye jhāne magge vippayutte ekavīsa …pe…
patthana22.36:12.1_0: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṁ,
